rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance with a ramp leading to the central courtyard.
Open space adjoining the courtyard for natural light and ventilation. Features minimalistic decor and large windows.
Serves as a dining area with a view towards the courtyard. Accessible from living room.
Wheelchair accessible kitchen with open design integrating natural light.

openings.details: Large entrance door with ramp and tactile indicators.

openings.description: Large windows ensuring abundant natural light.
Open courtyard accessible from all living spaces, providing natural ventilation and adherence to Vastu.

additional_features.description: All doorways and corridors are designed to be wheelchair accessible with proper turning space and ramps.
The layout respects traditional Vastu principles, ensuring positive energy flow and balanced spatial arrangements.
